DOC.brief_summary: Laparoscopic Ovarian Drilling valid procedure infertile anovulatory woman polycystic ovarian syndrome fail get pregnant ovulate ovulation induction medication clomiphene citrate exogenous gonadotropin . The reasearchers suppose endometrial curettage time laparoscopic ovarian drilling may boost fertility woman .
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Scratching During Laproscopic Ovarian Drilling Subfertile PCOS Women
DOC.detailed_description: Current literature suggest endometrial biopsy may improve pregnancy rate infertile woman hence investigator examine whether hypothesis apply infertile PCOS woman undergo laparoscopic ovarian drilling overcome ovulatory disfunction .
DOC.criteria: 1. subfertile woman anovulatory infertility due polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) . 2 . Women fail get pregnant least 6 month ovulation induction cycle clomiphene citrate exogenous gonadotropin 3 . Patent Fallopian tube confirm hysterosalpingography 4 . Fertile semen parameter partneraccording criterion World Health Organization ( WHO 2010 ) . 1. woman BMI > 30 , 2. age < 18 year > 39 year , 3. woman ovarian cyst identify transvaginal ultrasound 4. male factor infertility 5 . Tubal factor infertility suggest hystrosalpingogram ( HSG ) 6 . Women congenital malformation uterus bicornuate septate uterus suggest HSG .
